overview:
Currently Sales & Marketing Director APAC at dianomi, previously Digital Director at Time Out Australia and Time Out Singapore.

Launching dianomi in Sydney and across APAC - premium online lead generation for financial services and automotive our clients include JP Morgan, Fidelity and Investec. Working with publishers such as Morningstar, Reuters, London Stock Exchange, BigPond and Yahoo Finance.

Oversaw the launch of Time Out Singapore’s website in 2007/08, growth in Time Out Sydney’s site in 2009/10, Time Out Sydney’s iPhone app and launch of Time Out Melbourne’s website in 2010 & new Time Out Sydney site in 2011.

Extensive experience of SEO, SEM, digital advertising, mobile, social media, pages & advertising, analytics and email marketing.

Speaker at events such as AIM Networking Week, CeBIT Sydney WebForward 2011, ad:tech Sydney 2012, 2011, 2010 and 2009, EMSA - Email Marketing Summit Australia - Sydney November 2010, AIMIA Digital Summit 2010 - Sydney and ADMA Forum July 2010.

Over 50 appearances in London’s High Court, County & Magistrates Courts and before local authority committees.

external_links.title: Julian Peterson leaves Time Out to open Dianomi Sydney office
DIANOMI SETS UP ASIA PACIFIC HUB IN SYDNEY
